Package Server.game.map

Class ShipsMap

java.lang.Object
Server.game.map.Map<ShipsCell>
Server.game.map.ShipsMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShipsMap extends Map<ShipsCell> implements Serializable
Represents a map used for tracking ship positions in the game. Each cell on the map is a ShipsCell, containing information about ship placement and state.

      public boolean hasUnhitCellOfShip(int shipId)
      Checks if the ship with the specified ID has any unhit cells remaining.
      Parameters:
      shipId - the ID of the ship to check
      Returns:
